mapper.select: SELECT FCFG_SEQ ,FCFG_STIME ,FCFG_ETIME ,FCFG_TITLE ,FCFG_DDAY_TITLE ,TO_CHAR(FCFG_ETIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FCFG_ETIME_DATE ,FCFG_STATUS FROM FAIR_CONFIG WHERE FCFG_STATUS = 'A' OR ( FCFG_STATUS = 'Y' AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(FCFG_STIME, 'yyyymmddhh24miss')) <= TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss')) AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss')) < TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(FCFG_ETIME, 'yyyymmddhh24miss')) ) ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC
